chron1-4.p: Upon re-review of this conversation, provisions of the 2007 Deed of Gift between the estate of Richard Nixon and the National Archives will be implemented, where appropriate, to enhance access to materials. Changes in access will be noted once implemented.

chron5.p: This conversation has been re-reviewed under the provisions of the 2007 Deed of Gift between the estate of Richard Nixon and the National Archives. Changes in access have been noted.
